casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Patrick James CANNON. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016.

Deborah G. Stevenson, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Laurie N. Feldman, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 321 Conn. 924, 138 A.3d 285 (2016), is denied.
